metadata.title: CVE-2017-0835 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A remote code execution vulnerability in the Android media framework(libmpeg2). Product: Android. Versions: 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0.Android ID: A-63316832.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
